title: Ep 529 | Jase Tries for Baby Smiles with Different Songs & Missy's On-the-Nose Signs
description:
Jase jokes about Missy buying signs with obvious sayings on them, like "Home." Zach laughs about his wife's pillows that can't be touched or slept on, and Al says he has thrown away a pillow collection before. Jase goes through a playlist of songs to see what the baby enjoys, and he finally finds the unlikely song that brought hours of smiles. Zach discusses the meta-narrative of two worlds bridged together by the book of Hebrews, and Al challenges the audience to start reading Bible verses.

https://talkshop.live/watch/kNa2Qoub38oD — The ONLY place to get your signed copy of "Your Daily Phil" by Phil Robertson
